TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ChannelListenerBase extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelManagerBase implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
Public MustInherit Class ChannelListenerBase Inherits ChannelManagerBase Implements IChannelListener

summary.span: 提供服务上的通道侦听器的通用基实现。

span.span: Provides a common base implementation for channel listeners on the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务上的通道侦听器等待然后接受客户端上的工厂创建的通道。The channel listeners on the service wait for and then accept the channels created by factories on the client. 一旦在客户端和服务之间建立了通道连接，消息就可以进行交换，分布式应用程序就可以进行通信。Once the channel connection is established between client and service, messages can be exchanged and distributed applications can communicate. 侦听器提供的处理功能分层为通道侦听器堆栈集，从而在选择 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 功能进行部署时提供模块化。The processing functionality provided by the listener is layered into a stacked set of channel listeners to provide modularity when selecting the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] features to deploy. 服务堆栈中的每个通道侦听器都对应于客户端堆栈中的某个通道工厂。Each channel listener in the service stack corresponds to a channel factory in the client stack. 工厂创建的通道是真实的通道堆栈，这些通道由服务上的侦听器堆栈接受并处理。The channel created by the factory is really a stack of channels that are accepted and processed by the stack of listeners on the service.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在交换消息时，默认的 构造函数使用服务模型超时值对超时属性进行初始化。The default constructor initializes timeout properties with the service model timeout values when exchanging messages. 打开、发送和关闭操作的默认值为 1 分钟，接收操作的默认值为 10 分钟。The default value is 1 minute for open, send, and close operations and 10 minutes for the receive operation. 若要为这些操作超时指定其他值，请使用 。Use if you want to specify other values for these operation timeouts.

protected: ChannelListenerBase();

summary.span: 使用指定的默认通信超时初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with specified default communication timeouts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要为打开、发送、接收和关闭操作超时指定自定义值而不是使用服务模型默认值，请使用 而不是默认构造函数。Use instead of the default constructor if you want to specify custom values for the open, send, receive, and close operation timeouts instead of using the service model default values.

span.span: The default that specifies how long the close operation has to complete before timing out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值在创建新的 对象时设置。This value is set when creating a new object. 默认 构造函数将 属性的值设置为 1 分钟。The default constructor sets the property to a value of 1 minute. 如果要为此超时指定其他值，请使用 。Use if you want to specify another value for this timeout.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual T GetProperty<T> () where T : class;
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !!T GetProperty<class T>() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetProperty(Of T As Class) () As T

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 方法正在查询的类型化对象。

span.span: The typed object for which the method is querying.

summary.span: 从通道堆栈的适当层返回所请求的类型化对象（如果存在）。

span.span: Returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the channel stack.

returns.span: 如果存在，则为所请求的类型化对象 T，如果不存在，则为 。

span.span: The typed object T requested if it is present or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可请求从通道侦听器堆栈的适当层返回类型化对象，如用于设置属性或获取状态的接口。Use this to request a typed object such as an interface for setting properties or getting status from the appropriate layer in the channel listener stack. 如果某个层支持返回所请求的对象，则该层会返回对象。If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不支持，则该层仅仅将调用委托给堆栈中的下一层。If not, it simply delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack. 如果到达堆栈底部仍然没有层支持所请求的对象，则该方法返回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no layer supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`.
